entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hart Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:11 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hart Island 06:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -23.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -26.2°C
Wind: WSW 34 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. 60 percent chance of flurries along the Strait this afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. 60 percent chance of flurries along the Strait this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
